Title: Multimodality imaging approaches in alzheimer’s disease: Part II: 1H MR spectroscopy, FDG PET and amyloid PET
Abstract: © 2015, Academia Brasileira de Neurologia. All rights reserved.In this Part II review, as a complement to the Part I published in this supplement, the authors cover the imaging techniques that evaluates the Alzheimer’s disease according to the different metabolic and molecular profiles. In this section MR spectroscopy, FDG-PET and amyloid PET are deeply discussed.
